Apparatus.Commentary:
Y9.31c ahu.mərəcō] Geldner ahūm.mərəṇcō; Kellens, Pirart ahūm.mərəcō. Kellens, 1974, pp. 60 ff. secondary development of nasan infix (analogy vb. mərəṇc-). Cod. vv.ll.: ahu(.)mərəcō widely attested in the Iranian tradition and Sanskrit Yasna. ū seems a secondary lengthening before m as acc. sg. form ahūmərə(ṇ)cō or ahūm.m°. Cf. Y57.23 ahūm.mərəṇcō universally attested. Cf. short u in ahu.nāsəm VS18.6..
aiŋ́hā̊ daēnaiiā̊] Pirart. add. post yā ahūiriš zaraϑuštriš.
Y9.31c vacō] cod.; Geldner, Kellens, Pirart vaca. mąs [...] daϑānahe takes accusative (Kellens and Pirart, 1990, p. 256). vaca as analogical instr. sg. of š́iiaōϑnāiš?
